source_caption_data.pre_caption: This video presents a tranquil, static shot of a garden path in a tropical location. The view is from a paved patio, looking out onto a walkway made of rectangular grey stone slabs set in fine white sand. The path is surrounded by lush green vegetation and a large, gnarled tree, creating a secluded and peaceful atmosphere.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.initial_feedback:
This is not a static shot; the footage is unsteady. 
The large tree does not surround the path; it is only located on one side of the path.
source_caption_data.gpt_feedback: The video does not maintain a static shot as described; the footage appears unsteady. Additionally, the large tree is not surrounding the path but is situated on only one side.
source_caption_data.final_feedback: The video does not maintain a static shot as described; the footage appears unsteady. Additionally, the large tree is not surrounding the path but is situated on only one side.
